page.title: 15SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: There are four constables in the town police force. They spend 14 weeks in training school and another two years on probation. If necessary they work 24 hours a day, but one police man may work 4 to 8 hours a day depending on how busy they are. The uniform costs roughly Â£61. but they have to buy shoes themselves.The most common crimes are theft,damage and traffic offences.They have 3 vehicles which are a motor bike,a van and a car.There is a magistrate's court which is near the town square.Social services deal with child care,fostering adoption, child abuse as well as caring for mentally handicapped.Hostels and homes are for these people.The greatest problem they face is the growing number of elderly.They employ 110 people including 80 home helps.
